author: jdcasey
msg: [MRELEASE-359] Allow setting java-home and maven-home, such that the release plugin can be pointed at a particular version of Maven to use when forking new builds (it does this at least twice when running mvn release:prepare release:perform).

author: gawor
msg: better tie jaxb2 plugin version down
